title: Game Character Female Brazilian Warrior
description: Game Character Female Brazilian Warrior voiceover sound library provides you with more than 410+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files.
longDescription:
Audio demo


Unleash a fierce female south american fantasy warrior in your next game audio production with our Game Character Female Brazilian Warrior voice library featuring a youthful, confident, fiery collection of designed human voice over sound files created for realistic games & trailers. This voice-over sound library features a Brazilian accented fantasy female warrior antagonist game character inspired by popular MMORPG computer games.


  • 419 female voice-over audio files
  • 219.7 MB of voice samples
  • All in 44.1k 16bit .wav file format
  • 20 minutes of game ready & optimized audio


You may also be interested in:

Game Footsteps

AAA Game Character Witch Doctor

Ancient Game Sounds

Post Apocalyptic Trailer


Game Character Female Brazilian Warrior voiceover sound library provides you with more than 410+ immersive, game-ready voice-over sound files, vocalizations, fighting and pain sounds, custom character specific dialogue lines, stock non-player character dialogue lines, and everything needed to create compelling cinematic scenes, character, and outstanding gameplay audio experiences.


The Brazilian Warrior' voice profile is clean, authentic, warm with a pronounced accented vocal performance. She is perfect for a faction leader, tribal priestess, fighter, soldier, warrior, in-game non-player characters or any protagonist game characters where south american dialect aesthetics are needed. Her voice is ready for your game as is, provided in clean audio format in case you want to further process with your own vocals effects and processing.


UCS Compliant


All sound effects labeling is UCS compliant and is organized into categories to make it super easy to navigate to the right sounds. Inside you’ll find all files organized into the following folders: Battle Cries, Breathing, Coughing, Crying, Custom Lines, Fighting, Laughing, Pain, and Stock Lines. With 419 voice over audio files and 136 custom dialogue lines such as “They The End Is Upon You, We Must Act As One, Cower Before Me & more”. This pack has plenty of options to help your game characters come to life.


Game Character Female Brazilian Warriors voice over sound effects is not only packed with high-quality voice recordings but includes thought out, cohesive scripted dialogue and vocalizations to help you build dynamic western stories, game trailers, in-game characters, dramatic moments and so much more.

  • AAA Game Character Voice-Over Sound Effects Library
  • Perfect for NPC, protagonist characters
  • 15 battle screams, cries & sayings

  • 11 coughing
  • 146 stock NPC dialogue lines

  • 41 pain grunts and vocalizations
  • 32 fighting efforts
  • Works with any DAW or Game Engine
  • All Royalty Free & YouTube friendly
  • RTU-OTB (ready to use out of the box)
